attributes.action: Force Senior MPs to drive 'GREEN' cars instead of their gas-guzzlers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its all very well senior Cabinet Ministers telling us to leave the car at home or drive 'greener' cars, but they don't set the right example by doing so themselves.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=cars
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
